attributes.action: Take into public ownership two Concordes sited in Britain to allow their restoration and use in public displays
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As British airways appear unwilling to co-operate with voluntary groups to bring Concorde back into service for special events, I implore the government to take two Concordes back into public ownership. Then to lease the Concordes to voluntary groups for the purpose of restoration and public flypasts or special flights.
